contexts.context: ...The High Fane and the palace of Vivec are visited by <mark>hundreds</mark> of tourists and pilgrims daily. Citizens flock to the Arena...
...and combat sports. The comfortable domed Arena has seating for <mark>hundreds</mark> of spectators; beneath the Arena are dressing and storage rooms...
...as those of Black Marsh, the deserts preserve corpses for <mark>hundreds</mark> of years in a way that requires very little preparation....
...The High Fane and the palace of Vivec are visited by <mark>hundreds</mark> of tourists and pilgrims daily. Citizens flock to the Arena...
...upon him, "Baranat, I will make you stronger than a <mark>hundred</mark> warriors."
